name: Preemption
description: Preemption plugin for the IVP system.

configuration.default: <ip for signal controller>:<port used for signal controller>

configuration.description: List of vehicles BSM id that are allowed
TIM Plugin Log Level controls which log statements are printed to the terminal.

Name of the log file for this plugin. If a relative path is provided, this file will create a directory under /var/log/<PluginName> and add the file here. Not including this parameter or setting to (-) will direct log output to stdout which is the default behavior. NOTE: File logging for plugins should only be used for temporary data collection. Current file logging does not have mechanisms to purge data after a certain time or size.
